name: Bill Stone
introduction: Arthur George "Bill" Stone (June 10, 1939 - April 10, 2012) was a Formula One non-championship driver, who competed in one race, the 1969 Madrid Grand Prix, albiet in a Formula Two Brabham-Lotus. Stone is listed as retiring for unknown reasons, but completed enough laps to be credited with sixth in an eight car field. He was born Arthur George Stone on his parents' farm in Ngaruawahia.
